title: kvik / grotesk
content:
Any ideas on this one – help appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [kvik.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/typophile.com/files/kvik.jpg) | 18.21 KB |
author: Nikolaus

comments.content:
Hard to say, very generic and not many letters. Part of this soft sans with blunt corners (which actually could be the result of a post-treatment), that could be a lot of things even totally done from scratch. Their own actual corporate typeface is [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/avenir), they may even have started with it.  
Some more, same ballpark, rounded or not, fitting only for /k, /v and /i: [FF Daxline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/daxline), [Handel Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/handel), [Klavika](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/klavika), [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/univers), [FF Unit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/unit), [FF Signa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/signa), [FF Strada](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/strada), [FF Sari](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/sari) (nicely rounded but many redrawing/adjustments needed), [Neuzeit DIN and S](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/neuzeit) (Soft Rounded [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neuzeit-office-soft-rounded/)), [Notes Soft](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/notes-soft), [Hermes FB](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022060319/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/hermes)

Thanks a lot Ryuk!

Neuzeit Office Soft Rounded doesn’t look too bad, but as you said – probably customised ...
